sentences.sContent: I asked Clive where he was going, but he didn’t reply.
sentences.sCn: 我问克莱夫到哪儿去，但他没有回答。

sentences.sContent: Sorry it took me so long to reply.
sentences.sCn: 抱歉，我过了这么久才回复。

sentences.sContent: ‘Did you see Simon today?’ ‘Of course,’ Nathalie replied with a smile.
sentences.sCn: “你今天见到西蒙了吗？”“当然啦。”纳萨莉笑着答道。

trans.tranOther: to answer someone by saying or writing something
